column6: na Israel fie mpanyimfo: aso ɔnnyɛ hom asɛm dɛ hom bohu atsɛmbu?"

column3: na hom dɔ bɔn; hom a hom gua hɔn wer fi hɔn ho
column4: na hɔn nam fi hɔn mbiew ho;"

column2: "hom a hom dzi me man hɔn nam so; na hom pɔr hɔn wer fi hɔn ho
column3: na hom bubu hɔn mbiew: na hom bɔ no epruw dɛ kutu mu adze
column4: na dɛ nam a ɔwɔ dadzesɛn mu."
ɔdze n’enyim bosuma hɔn ber no
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wɔayɛ emumuyɛ wɔ hɔn nyɛe mu no."

column2: "Dɛm na EWURADZE ka tsia nkɔnhyɛfo a wɔma me man fom no; na wɔdze hɔn se ka na wɔtseatsea mu dɛ
column3: Asomdwee oo; na obiara a ɔnnhyɛ hɔn anomu no
dɛ hom nnkenya enyido adzehu; na sum bodwir hom
column4: dɛ hom nnkɛhyɛ nkɔm; na wi bɔtɔ nkɔnhyɛfo no do
column5: na adzekyee bɛyɛ katoo wɔ hɔn do."

column3: na nkɔnhyɛfo enyim egu ase; ɛhɛɛ
column4: hɔn nyinara bomuamua hɔn ano: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn mbuae bi nnyi hɔ."

column3: tum nam EWURADZE no sunsum do ahyɛ me ma ara ampa
column7: na Israel no bɔn edzi nkyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "No mu etsitsir no bu atsɛn gye akatua
column3: na no mu asɔfo kyerɛkyerɛ gye apaadze
column4: na no mu nkɔnhyɛfo hyɛ nkɔm gye sika: naaso wɔdze hɔnho twer EWURADZE
column6: Ana nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔwɔ hɛn ntamu yi bi? Mbusu biara remmba hɛn do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wobofuntum Zion dɛ kwa wɔ hom ntsi
column4: na fie mbepɔw no ayɛ dɛ kwaa mu nsorɔnsorɔmbea."
